website_summaries.verdict: An electric peeler for busy home cooks or those who lack hand strength.
pros: Peels fruits and vegetables very quickly
Blade is very durable, and replacement is included
cons: May work better with potatoes than apples

customer_reviews.title: What a great little peeler
customer_reviews.text: Just wow. I just peeled two bags of apples in mere minutes. With my arthritic hands that project normally takes an hour, but with this it took only 5 minutes. It does leave a little skin on the top and bottom, but not enough to complain about. Super easy to use and clean which is always a bonus. I do wish it wasn't such a cheaply made product, but at least it does what it promises to do. I can see this lasting at least a year of two of moderate to heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan JTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cuts waste and time
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's light and easy to use. When I use a potato peeler I was always peeling too much potato with the peel. This blade is fine and only gets the skin, in seconds. Except for the "poles" of the potato but I don't mind. It's easy to clean if you have a sprayer to just rinse off the spikes where you insert your potatoes. Small enough and doesnt take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: yestfl

customer_reviews.title: Great when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: The first one didn't work at all but was immediately replaced by Amazon. The second one was terrific while it worked and became something I wished I had had a long time ago. But, alas, the second one stopped working in less than two months. Amazon was great and refunded me. I wish it was still working though!
customer_reviews.author: MartyB

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: After hours of researching different peelers, I was so looking forward to when this one arrived. However I was so disappointed. It’s faster just to peel it by hand. While it is mesmerizing to watch, I would only use this if I couldn’t use both of my hands or slower than a turtle. I had to run various vegetables (potatos, apples, cucumbers, etc.) 2 to 4 times to get it fully peeled. If you buy vegetables cheap and they are not symmetrical/perfect in shape, this peeler won’t work very well either
customer_reviews.author: A Turtle ✅

customer_reviews.title: there are also extra blades and a paring knife which is nice. I loved this product so much I ended ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I was tired of peeling potatoes and apples during the holiday season. I could not wait to use it; it was a game changer!! It made food prepping and baking so much easier and faster. The machine is a bit loud, but it takes about 12 seconds to peel an apple (I timed it!) so the noise is not really a problem. I've used it on potatoes, mangoes, oranges, apples, and a cucumber (but in half). Within the packaging, there are also extra blades and a paring knife which is nice. I loved this product so much I ended up purchasing two more as gifts for friends!!
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: I'm guessing I received a unit that had previously been ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm guessing I received a unit that had previously been returned. It didn't have the power cord so I had to dig around at home to find one. Once plugged in I discovered the blade was installed backwards (probably why the previous customer returned it). It did not work at all and I've returned it. Hopefully they'll just toss it vs sending it out as "new" for a 3rd time.
customer_reviews.author: ILUVSEA

customer_reviews.title: Better to use manual potato peeler than this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the utterly useless product I bought for my kitchen. The issues: 1) It needs batteries to work. Not one or two. But 4 batteries. You need external power supply as well. 2) The potatoes (or whatever you are peeling) must be symmetrical. If it is not then all the best for you. The machine will not work. 3) The cutting blade part is made up on plastic. The while thing is made up of plastic. I don't think, it will last even a week if I use it regularly. Definitely I am going to return this product. Unnecessarily, I bought batteries for this..
customer_reviews.author: Customer12

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOUR MONEY!  Flimsy junk
customer_reviews.text: Watch the video! The red piece is the blade which slides on and clicks in place with a flimsy tab. As soon as pressure is applied it pops off! I bought it for my mom because she has bad thumbs and can’t peel things. I tried it on an apple which is softer and it peeled it but it leaves quite a bit of peel on top and bottom. I was hoping that this would work, but it’s made too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Parker

customer_reviews.title: Best potato peeler ever!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe I bought another peeler before finding this one. I got the other one for Christmas from my BF and he and I both decided to trash it. NOT THIS ONE! This one is plastic and even better than the metal one I had previously! I should have taken video to show just how easy this thing works! No more slaving over peeling potatoes anymore! All that you have to worry about peeling is the very top and bottom of your potatoes. Fine by me! This machine peels them in seconds! It's not a bulky gadget either so it can easily be stored out of sight! So happy I tried another one THAT ACTUALLY WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: CJC

customer_reviews.title: Well built kitchen wonder
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect. You still have to peel the top and bottom part (small part) but it does the rest without issue and I threw some very odd shaped potatoes at this thing to test it out. One was literally banana shaped and it peeled it perfectly. If your potato is really big you will need to cut it in half to fit on the machine (I told you I tried lots of potatoes on it) but it still peels them all just fine. The motor sounds “weak” but it does the job. I don’t know how long it will last but for the time being I’m satisfied because it does what it said it would do.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Leach

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy-only worked once
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the idea of the peeler, and it worked great the first time I used it. But the second time, the bottom stopped rotating completely, making the product unusable. And now, in order to get a refund I have to take time to go return it. Really inconvenient. Most other amazon affiliated companies will just refund your money if you can detail how it’s broken. They value your time if their product was defective. Not this one. Also felt very flimsy. Not good quality at all. Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey F.

customer_reviews.title: If it looks too good to be true---
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of my hands cramping when peeling potatoes and apples so I did some searching and found the Starfrit 93209 Rotato Express - Electric Peeler. I ordered it and used on the same day as I received it. Really excited--Placed my first apple on the peeler and pressed the red button--it proceeded to gouge out strips, leaving gaps in between and stopped about half way down the apple. Could never get it started again--back in the box it went. I would send it back but I assume that would be very difficult. Never had to send back anything that I purchased from Amazon. I would not recommend this to my worst enemy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No mess. Huge time saver. Way more efficient than any person.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is so cool. It’s pretty fast and simply works. Don’t use it on battery power, it’s stupid slow and underwhelming. Anyways, this device is really efficient whenever you’re trying to peel a large amount of vegetables or fruits when making a large meal. It also wastes a lot less because it’s more consistent than any person doing it manually. Saves a ton of time and mess so that’s more than worth it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Btncv

customer_reviews.title: Not good for apple
customer_reviews.text: It seems working fine for potato, but not good for apple. So I had to return
customer_reviews.author: Jisoo

customer_reviews.title: Why doesn't everyone have one!?
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely impressive. I purchased it as a gift for my mom. She had an old crank one, but didn't really use it. It didn't automatically peel like this one though. Everyone who saw it immediately wanted to purchase one. I don't know how more people don't have this in their homes. It is so nice knowing you won't get cut peeling potatoes anymore. I actually quit making potatoes many times, because I get hurt so often. But if I bought this, I'd be happy to start making potatoes again! Seems like a great time saver too.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlynn

customer_reviews.title: Limoncello Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: After seeing this on Try It Tuesday, we decided to give this a try for the annual, frustrating task of peeling just the yellow from lemons--no white pith--to make limoncello. What would have taken more than an hour of careful knifework in the past was completed in less than 10 minutes after cleaning the fruit and slicing a bit off the top and bottom of each so the machine could get a solid grip. The blade cuts shallowly so the result was nearly perfect and the long strands are going to be a LOT easier to strain out. Needless to say, we are happy with this little gem.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: DISHONEST SELLER !
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE OF THIS SELLER !!! Could not use item. No doubt item had been used. See photo. Sticky dried juice on base and food remnants on blade. MAJOR HEALTH HAZARD !!!!
customer_reviews.author: tiasmom0707Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Only works on one thing....
customer_reviews.text: I recently injured my right hand, and was unable to peel anything for 6-8 weeks. I couldn't live without my apples, so I decided to try this gadget to peel them for me....it worked on one type of apple only-a Macintosh. For everything else- pears, potatoes, different types of apples- it shredded the bottom and didn't work at all. It got me through the 6 weeks until I could manipulate a manual peeler, but it went right in the trash after that.
customer_reviews.author: Roobob

customer_reviews.title: Best "gadget" in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: I've done away with packaged potatoes and have been trying to eat "cleaner". My family loves potatoes but I hate peeling them. This device works like a CHARM! I just took the potatoes out... stuck them on and I'm about 5 minutes have a half a bag peeled! I can't wait to try it out on zucchini and make "spaghetti " as it does peel in continuous lines... which, would be perfect. The cutting arm self adjusts to each potato and size. I did however, have to cut a bit off at the top and bottom. No biggie because I had to cut them into smaller pieces to boil anyhow.
customer_reviews.author: KSG

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: This product does just what it says it does. It quickly peels potatoes cleanly; even odd shapes. I can peel ten pounds of taters in less than 5 minutes. One thing though you, at least I, have to wash the potatoes to get them wet. Dry peeling does not seem to work well. Because there is a bit of water involved I use batteries instead of the ac/dc adapter. I have used it on over twenty pounds of potatoes and the 4 AA batteries are still going strong. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ehrman

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I have an old wrist injury which makes it very hard for me to peel basically anyting repetitive motion is extremely painful for me this machine works great exactly as advertised fantastic couldn't be happier it's allowed me to cook mashed potatoes and all kinds of wonderful things again that I've been avoiding for years because of the pain in my wrist also if you just keep peeling even after the pill is gone you can make some pretty bomber fries just saying love this product
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth getting this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I’ve used it for russet and sweet potatoes with no problem at all. The make of it is plastic and it may not last for years, but for the time I’ve saved, and the cuts I don’t get while peeling potatoes, I recommend this to everyone!! And, by the way, I have a small kitchen, so every appliance I have must be needed and useful. This definitely deserves the small amount of space it uses. I did try to post a video, but my system is not cooperating — I’m sure there are other videos out there that will win you over.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great.  Saves hands from turning color from fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on large apples, mushes soft fruit. Misses the top and bottom of anything you put in and you have to hold it in place so it doesn't just shred the bottom. Also likes to skip about halfway through and often needs restarting. Still creates less mess than peeling a lot of fruit by hand. I can use it on slightly ripe persimmons but it will turn soft ones to mush. Better than doing everything by hand and all the hand turn models have a core function which would remove the sweet parts of the persimmons.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Strictly potato peeler.
customer_reviews.text: Won't peel anything besides a potato. Seemed like it advertised for more fruits and vegetables. But for the price it's good enough. I'm sure I'll be investing in a different peeler soon oh, I got it for my father who has carpal tunnel. Was really hoping he could use it for more than just potatoes. Peels the potatoes very quick though, which is nice. automatically turns off when it gets to the bottom of the potato. Seems like the razor might need to be replaced more often than most.
customer_reviews.author: Maryjean Furnia

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. It didn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Only worked one day. I try to cut tomatoes and the blade broke. I may have received a defective product because it didn't work as advertised. I was so confident on the reviews that I threw away the box, that I can't return.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Frost

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didnt buy this product thinking that it wouldn't peel my potatoes correctly. It does have a cheap feel to it cause it light weight. But it works great! Peels all my potatoes perfectly. We even tried peeling apples but it didnt work very well with that. I think the peel is too thin for the small blade to grasp. The peeling blade comes apart for easy cleaning my the bottom spikes (I dont know what to call them) does not come off and it is hard to wipe down. But over all I love this potatoe peeler...and that's alot coming from me cause I am not a gadget kind of gal.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Rotato several months ago. When it arrived there was a problem with the cord. Their customer service send a replacement immediately upon my report. I did not have to pay return shipping on the 1st item. This r Rotato works like an absolute charm. Have also used it countless times for pounds and pounds of potatoes when doing canning. It really speeds up the job! I have run this little machine for up to 20 lb of potatoes in a batch.
customer_reviews.author: Botanical Bounty

customer_reviews.title: Peeled mangos beautifully and saved lots of time
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with a power cord! Not sure if this is normal but luckily I had one that fits. Peeled mangos beautifully and saved lots of time. It didn't do a very good job on apples unfortunately because that's what I bought it for. But for the price it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Idaho spud farmer loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got this one for my mom. She is an Idaho spud girl and this sat in her cabinet for a year until there was big family gathering and potato salad was her responsibility. She broke this thing out and now reports she won't peel another potato without it. She loved it so much she bought everyone in the family one for this last Christmas. I should get a finders fee for the quantity she bought.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mac Man

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure how I feel about this gadget. It's more of a novelty than anything else. It did peel my potatoes somewhat quickly. With the time it takes to stick the potato on there (cut it down if it's too big), wait for it to peel, go back with a peeler/knife to take off the top/bottom and cut out any bad spots and clean up the peels, I'd be just as well off doing it the old fashioned way. Just doesn't save enough time to make it a great buy for me. I already own a great apple peeler/corer/slicer and a handheld veggie spiralizer so this was just an extra I should have left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Curls

customer_reviews.title: Great for sweet potatoes
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at this little device. I hate peeling potatoes. I cook about 10 lbs of sweet potatoes at a time when meal prepping and dread peeling them. I could not believe this little contraption works but it works so well. Just cut the ends off flat, pop them on this and voila, a peeled potato. Little mess, little effort. Little kitchen space forsaken to store it as well. I am highly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Caley G

customer_reviews.title: Arthritic hands anyone?
customer_reviews.text: I checked several sites for reviews of peelers and this one was invariably top rated though there are several negative reviews so I went ahead and ordered it. No, it doesn't peel the very ends of potatoes etc, and it doesn't get the eyes, but it does very well on less than perfect shaped potatoes and it even did a fair job on an apple that was getting soft. I have arthritic hands which make holding a paring knife painful, this does a good job, saves my hands and is much faster than peeling by hand. It is plastic, so I can't comment on durability, but I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I had a bowl of canning pears just waiting for this amazing gadget to arrive. What would have literally taken me hours to peel, took me minutes instead with this nifty lil gadget. We have fruit trees in our backyard and I have let fruit go bad because my hands hurt so bad from peeling them....not any more. I could not be happier with my purchase....for me....a much needed item.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept - would like to see a better execution of this idea
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea however the execution could have been better. Peeler works great with fruit/vegetables like potatoes, apples, cucumbers, etc. Not so good with oranges for example - it takes about two passes to peel of the skin - you're still left with a lot of fiber which it can't take out. I would love to see a product here that can work on a variety of fruits and vegetables and not some selected ones. Having said this - I still like the product. Its a fun addition to the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mo

customer_reviews.title: Worked the First 2 times....
customer_reviews.text: This worked pretty well the first two times- on both apples and kiwi. But then the 3rd time I went to use it (4 days after my return window closed), it didn't peel at all. I tried cleaning the blades and went through all the trouble shooting options, but nothing worked. I feel like I wasted my money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: A White

customer_reviews.title: Work saver!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use d it to peel a half bushel of Apple's and what a pleasure to use! For someone like me with carpal tunnel syndrome, or arthritis, or any hand or wrist issue...I highly recommend this product!! It doesn't get every bit of peel off the top and bottom of the item, but man, what a time saver! Easy to use, clean, and comes with 2 extra blades. So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lis

customer_reviews.title: It's a great potatoes peeler and works quick and easy to clean .
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorite things ever . I've had one that I actually bought in a thrift shop and wore it out. I was so happy when I found this to replace my old one and it works do quick and does a really efficient job in potatoes and makes the job quick easy and painless. I would recommend this to others and you can always purchase blades if you need them .
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: I regret buying this
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is really cheap and the blade is terrible. It’s easier to just peel the apples myself. I’ve used it for potatoes and apples and beets and it just does not heal very well and I regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Crachel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Peeling potatoes is not our favorite, but this was horrible. The bottom stopped after the first potato. We researched and tried other sizes, items, etc. Terrible and cannot get a refund because we did not try it till now. Still looking for an item that will do what this one said... Terribly disappointed. Not to say out the money spent and the feature it was suppose to do!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Porreca

customer_reviews.title: Peeler skips whole sections
customer_reviews.text: (Picture shown is sideways). First...the unit is make of cheap plastic. Second...tried both apples and potatoes and the blade fails to engage repeatedly leaving whole rows skipped. Third...the parts can't be removed to clean. I had to use a toothbrush to try to clean areas used before returning. I gave it three stars for ease of use because the concept design was good.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have severe arthritis in my hands and peeling potatoes or anything like that has become almost impossible for me. This thing is a miracle worker, now I only have to cut off the unpeeled ends and I'm done! My grandson loves peeling his apples with this, it's a great way to get him to eat more apples. This peeler is a lifesaver for me!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Fears

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE ROTATO EXPRESS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to share this review I did. Forgive my country accent. I am so in love with this. This is a life changer for me. It is extremely hard for me to peel potatoes because of my Raynaud and Lupus which cause my hands to cripple up. If you have OA or RA or any disease that makes it difficult to peel fruits and vegetables please look into getting this. I can't say enough about how excited I am. The munchkins loved watching it and do a twist potato dance now. ❤❤❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: CAROLYN

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to use because of a hand injury and I cannot hold/peel potatoes properly. My mother recommended using it. When it arrived, it did not turn on. It was defective out of the box. I just returned it for a refund and decided I didn't want to risk ordering another and having to make another return.
customer_reviews.author: William T. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Time saver, awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I even start.... seriously. We are a family of 10 that absolutely loves breakfast style cooked potatoes. With that said I thought this item is worth a shot because I despise all of the steps it takes to make potatoes, let’s just say this new product I got cut my time in half.... i absolutely love it and wish I would have bought it long ago. It was so easy to figure out how to work and I was in shock! When something Is to good to be true then it normally is, not this time!!! DEFINITELY recommend!!!!! I’ll even be purchasing another one just to keep to have a back up! 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼❤️🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dever

customer_reviews.title: Time saver and works well
customer_reviews.text: I received it very quickly, right in time for Thanksgiving preparation. I used it for 5 pounds of potato and 4 pounds of sweet potatoes. It handles potato very well. Had some trouble with oddly shaped sweet potato , however if you hold the area of blade which attaches to pole it helped littlebit . Haven’t tried apples yet. I had to manually do the top and bottom. However, it wasn’t big deal and Quick. It was still so much faster than doing it manually and also saved Hand cramp.
customer_reviews.author: Dipti_Patel

customer_reviews.title: Didn't have the AC adapter included (though it is supposed to)
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with the AC adapter so tried to use batteries. Going to send it back and hopefully get one with the AC adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time and money. I had to return mine. Besides not working at all on anything it is very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Wisniewski

customer_reviews.title: the best gadget in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: i love this thing. its the best gadget in my kitchen. be careful to not push the red start button to hard, it will fly off. also be sure and seat the potato or apple on really well or it will fly off if not pushed down far enough. otherwise i would give it a five star rating. i still recommend it very highly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri cullinan

customer_reviews.title: Love this!! My favorite kitchen gadget
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have used it for almost every round fruit and potatoes. It is soooo much faster than peeling the old fashion way. The customer service is also awesome. I needed a extra piece and they sent it free of charge. I tell everyone to buy one. I dont usually give 5 star reviews, but this is so affordable and makes life so much easier that I had to.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Limited usefulness
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help speed up prep for Thanksgiving. It doesn't peel the whole potato when used for potatoes, requiring that you peel the ends by hand. It couldn't peel parsnips at all. It would start and then the piece would jam preventing the blade from continuing to peel. I expect it would be similarly challenged by carrots. So if you want something to peel most of a potato and nothing tougher, it will do that much.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ring

customer_reviews.title: Works kinda
customer_reviews.text: If you look at the example pictures of the peeling of the items you can see it leaves a large portion of the top unpeeled and those are the optimal peels meaning your imperfectly shaped fruits will have large portions of it unpeeled. The way it works leaves top and bottom unpeeled so unless you plan to leave a large portion of your items wasted you're looking at doing some manual peeling. Frankly the overall process of using the device is not much faster or preferable to manual peeling and the device doesn't feel sturdy. I would have certainly returned it to purchase a high quality manual peeler but I was too lazy to return the $20 item.
customer_reviews.author: Ark

customer_reviews.title: For my house it’s a must.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. You’d think I bought him a gold bar. He absolutely loves it. He’s 100% Irish and the love of potatoes is a given. Now he’s looking for (more) reasons to have spuds. It’s much faster than I thought. The only down side is that it doesn’t get the skin that’s indented in spots.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Powers

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and it works!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gadget. Because it works so well, I actually prepare the food I bought to prepare. Nothing “matures” in the ‘frig any more. No more guilt. I’m a pretty lazy, reluctant kitchen person but now I can prepare food in a fraction of the time it took before. I’m eating healthier and I have more time for what I consider “funner” stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna D

customer_reviews.title: The easiest way to peel quickly and effortlessly
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the Best Buy’s ever. I bought this for my 91 year old mother who has problems with her hands. It peals everything easily and minimal waste. It also cuts the time by easily 90% than doing it manually. I just wished the materials were more durable however even though it’s flimsy plastic there is no problems with it and especially for the price you can’t go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: P.bailey71

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product at all!
customer_reviews.text: For the price a great helping product to get things done in the kitchen! Works great, after getting used to it, but could be of little "tougher" construction! Used it about 10x and so far no real issues, except the kinda flimsy setup to get it "going" at each vegetable/fruit! Ok product though!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASTON MARTIN Expert

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great tool. It's true that the object you are peeling needs to be somewhat even on the surface. The bumpy/uneven fruits and vegetables won't get perfectly peeled but still there will only be a few areas you might need to go over with a manual peeler. All in all a GREAT timesaver. This will do a 10lb bag of potatoes in minutes. Also works great on citrus fruit and apples
customer_reviews.author: Cara L. Wahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after just a few uses
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this thing. It's really fun to watch it peel apples and potatoes. We used it about 4 or 5 times. Once for a few potatoes and the other times for a couple of apples for snacks. All of a sudden it does not work at all. It's very disappointing because we really really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonG

customer_reviews.title: Good for bad hands
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a product like this for my Arthritic hands and it works but still leaves some of the peelings on so still have some to take off but better than the entire thing did a lot of apples so took very little time to do them all and I enjoyed working with it. It does seem a bit fragile to me and very careful with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow—it actually works.
customer_reviews.text: Read others reviews. 80% love it.. the rest were so so or worse. Well, took a chance. And yes it is light weight plastic but this thing actually works. Pealed 8 peaches just like that. Worked even on one peach that was more oblong than round. I’m in love. Highly recommend. Take a chance like I did!
customer_reviews.author: bcapbcap

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I had to make potato salad yesterday which gave me the opportunity to finally use it. I was skeptical at 1st because the unit is so lightweight that it feels as if you thump it it would break. However, to my surprise it can hang with the big dogs! I am going to purchase a couple more for gifts.....
customer_reviews.author: 4 Christ

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: What I want to know is, where have you been all my life?? There is nothing I dislike about this peeler, so far i have not needed a blade change, though there is an additional blade included. Also they sell extra blades as well. All in all I would and have recommended it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: maine4me

customer_reviews.title: Dreams DO Come True! Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is magical! I am quite the fan of the potato. And now with this thing a huge section of the processing has been eliminated!! Only tested it once, but was fun to use, too! Am very happy to have one of these. I wonder if they make a cutter-upper as great as this peeler?!?! Thanks, Starfrit!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Still better than peeling the whole apple
customer_reviews.text: This device is used to peel Granny Smith apples, about 10 at a time. It peels about 75% of the surface with the remainder still needing to be hand peeled. It also often skips on top of the peel for one or two rotations while running down the apple. Not perfect but the work that it does saves my hands for the slicing operation. Cleans up easily and the setup is very simple. Built very cheaply but what would one expect for a $20-ish item these days?
customer_reviews.author: John P

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: We had a great peeler when I was a kid. It was made of metal and up stood years of use. This one is made of cheap plastic and not worth a dollar. It doesn’t peel the top and bottom 2 inches. The spear that holds the fruit is not easily removed for cleaning. I don’t even use it anymore. I would have returned it but didn’t save the box. Save your money and buy a sturdy model.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. I peel 24 large apples every two days with it. Saves me so much time, keeps me from accidentally cutting myself. Doesn't last forever, I can make one of these last me several months to a year with heavy use (24 apples every two days). But it's electronic and inexpensive, so it met expectations in that regard. 5 stars so far.
customer_reviews.author: webber

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The arm is too strong digs in too far. Blade could be better. A little wider would help.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This product is like a toy for a child to play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and read all the review. This product is a joke. the motor is very weak. I don't consider it a kitchen tool. I returned it to Amazon. Most of the review can be fake. Sorry! I am disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Huy D. Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: You have to have the correct size produce to use or you keep resetting the blade height. We dislike this produce. Would not advise anyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste the money!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money, this thing is a cheap piece of plastic. This is my second attempt to purchase a peeler and both were broken upon delivery. Both very light weight and poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this machine!! Goes thru a bag of potato's very quickly. Makes it easy when you have arthritis in your hands and it's hard to stand to peel potato's. I use it on a regular basis, not only on potato's, but other vegetables. Highly recommend for any one who has problem's peeling vegetables or some fruits.
customer_reviews.author: peaches8134

customer_reviews.title: I Curly Fry....easy!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these gadgets back years ago. It was manual not powered so this was very welcome in the kitchen. Make your own curly fries or whatever simply! I love using this for potatoes bit also apples and anything else that i want to strip out. You'll have alot of fun with this edpecially if you have little helpers in your kitchen. Makes things fun and flavorful!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Works on potatoes. Struggles with sweet potatoes. Chintzy quality.
customer_reviews.text: It works well and saves a lot of time for peeling regular potatoes. It struggles with tougher skins such as on yams and sweet potatoes. They went really cheap on the build quality. The plastic is more flexible and light than it should be and the whole thing flexes and wobbles. You can hear the cheap plastic gears on the small electric motor working hard. I don't expect it to last long, though maybe I'm wrong. I would have preferred a more solid unit at a higher price. UPDATE: It broke, no big surprise. The piece that holds the peeler blade together fell apart. I don't understand why it's so cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gadget!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this machine! I've always hated worrying about cutting myself when I am peeling apples or potatoes. With this item you just stab it on there and watch the magic happen. It's awesome how it only takes the skin, nothing more! The product booklet says to make sure you use symmetrical fruits or veggies but I've used it on all kinds of lopsided things and it figures it out somehow. Awesome product and saves so much time! Can't wait to try it on other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very fast peeling!
customer_reviews.text: Used to peel peaches and potatoes. Does not remove all of the peels but reduced peeling time significantly. Also it reduced the gouging and only removed peels. Still had to do the ends and any knots in the potato. Time required for 10# of potatoes was about 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Heere

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: It broke. Was used only 3-5 times. Only lasted for about 5 pounds of potatoes and 3 apples. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: snrooster

customer_reviews.title: It serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works a 100 times better than I expected. This is great mainly for apples, potatoes, or anything with the basic round or oblong shape. It doesn't hold anything bigger than about5-6" tall or 4" wide though so wasn't beneficial for a lot of veggies I'd hope to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage! Stay away.
customer_reviews.text: Broke this product 2 days and 1use after getting this. Figured it can't be that bad. Well I was very wrong. Broke at the spring loaded blade pivot and I didn't even bother with sending it back for a replacement because I knew that one would be as bad. So here I am trying to urge people to listen to the reviews & get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B Jack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We just peeled over 20 pounds of potatoes in preparation for Norwegian Lefse baking. This machine saved so much time and effort, we can't recommend it enough! I ordered extra blades, but really, this machine came with two extra and I think that is sufficient unless you are going to be peeling 20 pounds every day. The two extra ones are still unused in the storage area of the peeler; the first blade seems to be sharp as ever!
customer_reviews.author: S. Herrick

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good gadget to have because it doesn't have as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good gadget to have because it doesn't have as much "mess" as the manual type! However...with the manual type it slices the apple for me as well as peel it...not really sure which one is quicker...also, I found it really cumbersome to press the plastic lever that releases the peeler...not quite sure why this seems difficult! Might be the placement of it? ..or maybe my fingers are slippery b/c of the apple? Don't know...Would I purchase one for someone else? Probably not! ..but I will continue to use it regardless! Maybe once I'm used to it more it will grow on me!
customer_reviews.author: michelle backlas

customer_reviews.title: Who would have thought?
customer_reviews.text: Not me, that a $14 contraption would work so well peeling potatoes. My wife and I have a food trailer we sell bbq out of and she really hated hand peeling potatoes for our potato salad. I took a chance on this and it has worked really well so far. There is very little waste, and it will peel the next potato before we can dice up the previous one. My wife made me buy two more so that we can run 2 at once and have 1 for backup. I'm giving it 4 stars for now, as we've only had it a week and want to see how it holds up. But great so far!!
customer_reviews.author: Muddawg

customer_reviews.title: This is the best kitchen helper you probably think you don't need
customer_reviews.text: This is the best kitchen helper you probably think you don't need. If you have to peel more than 2-3 potatoes often or it hurts your hands to peel anything anymore, buy this today. We use this often for potatoes, sweet potatoes, fruits, and most things with a peel. It peels amazing well and fast. Cleanup is so easy too; I just wipe the contact points and put the detachable blade in the dishwasher. We had one for several years and it was still going strong until I broke the arm on it (my fault). We ordered this one right away and would not be without our Rotato Express.
customer_reviews.author: AMY77

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box, I was not really happy over the construction. It is made of a thin plastic that I felt could easily break. It did the job of quickly peeling potatoes. I felt it should have a tension adjuster as often it dug deep into the potato thus loosing some of it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic purchase. Wasn't really expecting it to work for price. Pleasantly surprised that is works great. Apples, potatoes, vegetables all peeled with no effort. I have always dreaded the potato peeling but actually enjoy it now. Have bad carpal tunnel both hands and this is a game changer. On negative it isn't the easiest to clean the prong holder. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need to get a grip when you have the automatic peeler.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for Christmas. She absolutely loves it. After the first week two of her friends contacted me for the information so they could get them one as well. My mom is 70 and has started to lose some grip when peeling potatoes. This is exactly what she needed.
customer_reviews.author: John Brown

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a potato peeling beast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my grandmother for Christmas. She loves to cook, but recently started suffering from arthritis in her hands, keeping her from attempting many of her favorite dishes. She absolutely loves this thing as it saves her hands and speeds up the prep process a ton. I helped her peel potatoes using this, which it worked exceptionally well at. I don't have any direct examples of its other uses, but honestly I'm considering getting one for myself just for peeling potatoes. It's fast, effective and efficient. Well worth the money. I had my doubts, but this thing works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, it really works, it could have been designed a little better for cleaning, the spicket the potato or veggie sits on does not come off to clean. besides that I love love it. I ordered the improved one but received the older model, but still enjoy using it and not having to peel potato's!! I have not been paid for this review of the Starfrit 93209 Potato Express Electric Peeler. I am real customer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer of Amazon2

customer_reviews.title: Makes peeling more efficient
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. If you don’t get the potato (or whatever) secured in there perfectly, it doesn’t peel right. Every once in a while I’d have to adjust the potato. Not a big deal. This was a life saver when I had to peel 10lbs of potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: Clara Merriman

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but made of por quality materials (plastic)
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I peeled oranges and potatoes, works great just the material should be better quality. It is made of bad que plastic. Be gentle or it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: If you hate peeing potatoes like I do this is the tool for you. Super easy to use and peels potatoes in seconds. Its super easy to clean too. I was so happy with it that I ended up gifting this to my friends and they love it too. Perfect addition to your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Swapnil Shah

customer_reviews.title: Easy peeling from now on!
customer_reviews.text: I have to peel fruit before I eat it for medical reasons and I'll never go back to manually peeling after using this peeler! My only complaint is the peeler is difficult to clean. The pieces you want to be able to take off to clean simply don't come off, so you end up putting the whole contraption in the sink so you can properly clean it. However, this is only a minor annoyance compared to how much easier this makes my life!
customer_reviews.author: M. Webster

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it a couple times so I’m not sure of the durability.
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, Except when the fruit is soft, or the shape is not consistent in size. It does a great job feeling potatoes. You cannot take it apart to clean up so I have resorted to wiping it as thoroughly as possible. I have only used it a couple times so I’m not sure of the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Darci Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about this product. Was excited to use. Its VERY light weight & I am unsure if that is a good thing. Simply because when adjusting and taking off you have to hold item down or will fall over. Also it only peels shapes that are perfect. Other wise you have to go over and cut off the other pieces. Wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Soo

customer_reviews.title: This is literally the best thing I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best thing I have ever bought. It peels potatoes so easy. It's the only way I peel potatoes now even if I only need 4-5 potatoes. At Thanksgiving I peeled 20# in a FRACTION of the time it would be by hand, and my back did not hurt. Also, you can use the remnants as shoe string potatoes or as fries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best helper in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my hands and this is the greatest thing I have found in along time. If it could dice up the potatoes as well it would awesome. But it makes life easier for me especially around the holidays. If I did not have this I would no longer be able to fix the things I fix for the holidays.great item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started using this product. So far I really like it for the cost. I peeled a 5 lb bag of potatoes with it just the other day and was done in about 10 mins. That included washing them as I went so if I had them already to go it would have been a lot less as it can peel a whole potato in seconds. Also as an added bonus as its peeling it provides long strings of potatoes if you like shoestring fries you can make your own fresh. I am happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!  Peel away!
customer_reviews.text: This works very nicely on potatoes, fruit, anything I threw at it. The big test will be this fall when I make apple pies and will be peeling and coring about 30 pounds of fruit. But I think this can handle it. Clean up was a breeze, which I really appreciate. Other peelers I've used are a nightmare to clean. This has a permanent place in my kitchen rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Erika J. Kilborn

customer_reviews.title: Time-saver
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during apple season. It took a minute to figure out how to properly place the apple, but after that operation was easy. Works very well on round objects. I will not get all the peels on irregular shapes fruits and veggies, but that is expected. The blade has lasted for a while, and it came with two extra. This machine has saved me a great deal of time, and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I used to hate peeling potatoes but this is a game changer. I can’t wait to use it on other veggies and fruit. Food gets stuck in the peeler part- I think I will use a straw brush to clean right away after using it.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ADORE this gadget!!! My husband makes a big Thanksgiving dinner every year so I bought this as a gift to help. We have had this gadget for about six or seven months and it is awesome. I never make mashed potatoes because peeling can be a chore but this makes it easy and fun. You put he potato in the holder, line up the peeler and press a button. The peel comes off in one easy strip. So simple and safe! It can also peel apples and pears which I imagine would make pies easier. For the price I'd say just buy it today! It is also not very large and fits in the box no sweat
customer_reviews.author: Skelly

customer_reviews.title: Goid deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am new to using this product. It seems fine, saves time of course. The only downside so far is that we peeled apples good, but the apple seemed a bit smaller than it could have been. So maybe it takes off a little more than the peel. Same with potatoes, but it sure works fast. Good deal for the price so far
customer_reviews.author: Terri Zahorniak

product_meta.title: Starfrit 093209-006-BLCK Electric Rotato Express, Black
product_meta.description:
STARFRIT ROTATO EXPRESS 
PEELS INSTANTLY POTATOES, FRUITS AND VEGETABLES
Starfrit Rotato Express Plop on a potato, peel it and pare it in 10 seconds flat—sayonara potato skins! The Rotato Express instantly peels not just potatoes but also other fruits and vegetables at the push of a button. It stops automatically when the peeling is over and will operate cordlessly with batteries, making it "picnic portable."

CHARACTERISTICS
 * Two extra blades tucked in a built-in compartment 

 * Handy thumb knife for quick, easy paringt 

 * Non-slip base

 * Durable ABS plastic

 * Ultra safe design: no need to touch or hold the vegetable while it's peeling

 * More hygienic than manual peeling

 * Cleans easily with a damp, sudsy cloth

 * Operates alternatively with a 6.0 Volt electrical adaptor

 

NO WASTE, NO EFFORT
Peels just the skin! Peeling fruits and vegetables is quick and easy with the Rotato Express. It peels just the skin without wasting any of the nutritious part of the vegetable. The Rotato Express is simple and safe to operate; even a child can use it. Its non-slip base holds it securely to the counter or other work surface. Rotato comes with a little plastic knife, stored conveniently under the base. It's specially designed for easy removal of potato eyes or other blemishes. 

PEELS THE FOLLOWING FOODS
 1.  Potatoes
 2.  Cucumbers
 3.  Apples
 4.  Pears
 5.  Peaches
 6.  Turnips
 7.  Onions
 8.  Tomatoes
 9.  Radishes
 10. Kiwis

HELPFUL HINTS
Before peeling, put a paper towel beneath the Rotato to catch peelings.

When choosing foods to be peeled, choose fruits and vegetables that are firm, blemish free and symmetrically shaped. Fruits and vegetables more than 5.5" tall should be cut in half so the Rotato Express can grip them firmly.

Rotato Express Parts HOW TO PEEL FRUITS AND VEGETABLES
 1. Center the food on the bottom food holder and press gently
 2. Lower the upper food holder so that it grasps the food and holds it securely
 3. Using the height adjustment lever, raise the cutter arm so that it rests on top of food to be peeled. WARNING: Do not grab cutter blade… it is razor sharp!
 4. While pressing lightly on the upper food holder, press on the power button. The skin peels off in one clean, continuous curl

HOW TO REMOVE PEELED FOOD
 1. Lift upper food holder from food and raise it to the top of the support column.
 2. Grasp food, and using a gentle back and forth rocking motion, remove food from bottom food holder pulling towards you. Do not yank your fruit or vegetable straight up from the bottom food holder. You don't want to accidentally swing your hand into the holder spike. WARNING: Do not grab cutter blade… it is razor sharp.
 3. Trip off any deep potato eyes with the little plastic knife. Use the same knife to remove blemishes on fruit and vegetables.
